Name: Carlotta's "Gem"
AttributesDescription: Before the battle begins, Carlotta places a handful of crystals in your hands. These are crafted from her Forte, akin to the texture of the bullets she uses in combat. Could there be a hidden message within this gesture?
BgDescription:
In the Montelli family, it's common to pass on messages through coded language, gestures, and postures. By handing you her weapon and bullets, Carlotta assures you that you are safeâ€”she has no intention of harming you during the upcoming action.
Trust her, and follow her lead in this performance.
